title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 564 - Prepayment Of Sales Tax On Cigarettes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 564 - Prepayment Of Sales Tax On Cigarettes

State Regulations
§ 564.1 - Joint administration by the Department of Taxation and Finance of State and local sales and compensating use and cigarette taxes
§ 564.2 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 564

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 1103, 1142[1], [12], 1250

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
